title: Selmer Paris Series II Model 52JU Jubilee Alto Saxophone - Lacquer Finish
description: The Selmer Paris Series II Model 52JU Jubilee Alto Saxophone with a lacquer finish is a premier instrument for professional musicians. Known for its rich, powerful sound and exceptional projection, this saxophone features an elegant, engraved bell and a redesigned octave mechanism for enhanced playability. The high-quality brass construction and stunning lacquer finish ensure durability and a beautiful appearance. The metal thumb rests provide additional comfort, making it ideal for extended playing sessions. Perfect for classical, jazz, and contemporary music settings, the 52JU combines Selmer's legendary craftsmanship with modern innovations to deliver an outstanding musical experience.
meta_title: Selmer Paris Series II Model 52JU Jubilee Alto Saxophone - Lacquer Finish
meta_description: Shop the Selmer Paris Series II Model 52JU Jubilee Alto Saxophone, featuring an elegant engraved bell, redesigned octave mechanism, and stunning lacquer finish. Ideal for professional musicians. Buy now at a special price!

title: Selmer Paris Series II Model 52JU Jubilee Alto Saxophone - Silver-Plated

Renowned for its rich, powerful sound and exceptional projection, this model features an elegant, engraved bell and a redesigned octave mechanism for superior playability. The high-quality brass construction and stunning silver-plated finish ensure durability and a striking appearance. Metal thumb rests provide added comfort, making it ideal for extended practice and performance sessions. Perfect for a wide range of musical styles, from classical to jazz, the 52JU combines traditional craftsmanship with modern design for an exceptional playing experience.
